title: Why Your Timing Belt is Critical for Engine Health
summary: Learn about the critical role of the timing belt in your engine and why neglecting its replacement can lead to catastrophic failure.
content: Content for Why Your Timing Belt is Critical for Engine Health goes here. This in-depth article explains the vital function of a car's timing belt, which synchronizes the engine's crankshaft and camshafts. It details the difference between interference and non-interference engines, highlighting the severe damage that can occur if a timing belt fails in an interference engine. The article covers the common signs of a worn timing belt, such as ticking noises from the engine, misfires, or oil leaks from the front of the motor. It also outlines the manufacturer's recommended replacement intervals and explains why this preventative maintenance is one of the most important investments a car owner can make to ensure their vehicle's long-term health and avoid costly engine rebuilds.
